_comments.csF: list of strings - the list of csFiles in ./template that will come from the student's submission
_comments.templateP: path to the template's directory containing code files
_comments.slnP: path to the .sln file in a vs project
_comments.msB: user path to local msbuild instance (usually in local VS install)
_comments.msT: user path to local mstest instance (usually in local VS install) - ex: 'C:/Program Files (x86)/Microsoft Visual Studio/2017/Community/Common7/IDE/MSTest.exe'
